analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component that renders a full-page perspective grid background with continuously animated grid lines using purely CSS/SCSS.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a decorative animated grid effect for landing pages or any section that needs a dynamic background in the Martyrs project.

Components.name: AnimatedGrid
Components.responsibility: Renders the grid container and the animated grid lines.

Components.name: grid (CSS class)
Components.responsibility: Sets up 3D perspective and a cover-sized background area for the grid.

Components.name: grid-lines (CSS class)
Components.responsibility: Draws the repeating linear-gradient grid pattern and animates it along the Y axis with a perspective transform.

Dependencies: vue-loader (for parsing template and scoped styles)
analysis.Usage: Import the component in another Vue file: `import AnimatedGrid from 'modules/landing/components/elements/AnimatedGrid.vue'`, register it, then embed `<AnimatedGrid/>` in the template to display the animated background.
Notes: No <script> blockâ€”component has no reactive data or methods.
Styles are scoped to avoid leaking into other components.
Keyframes animation named 'play' handles continuous translateY + rotateX transforms.
Perspective is set on the wrapper to produce 3D grid effect.
Background grid size and speed can be tuned via SCSS variables or props if extended.
